name: junior-techbots
description: App for Students and Teachers, to manage coding clubs
author: Ben Chartrand

scripts.deploy:prod:hosting: nuxt build --modern=client && firebase use default && firebase deploy --only hosting:default
scripts.deploy:prod:functions: echo this won't work as you need to use Node 10. Use your Ubuntu instance
scripts.deploy:prod:rules: firebase use default && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules
scripts.deploy:staging:hosting: nuxt build --modern=client && firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only hosting:staging
scripts.deploy:staging:functions: echo this won't work as you need to use Node 10. Use your Ubuntu instance
scripts.deploy:staging:rules: firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules
scripts.firestore:export: gcloud config set project junior-techbots-staging && gcloud firestore export gs://junior-techbots-staging-firestore-backup
scripts.firestore:import: gcloud config set project junior-techbots-staging && gcloud firestore import gs://junior-techbots-staging-firestore-backup/2020-04-11T22:15:18_23337/
